name: Red-Shark API
description: Red-Shark is the most secure and innovative open-source social media platform in Brazil, designed to help aspiring developers work on a large-scale project, gain real-world experience, and advance their careers—no job required!

name: Red-Shark Front-End
description: The front-end of Red-Shark, delivering a seamless user experience for Brazil’s most secure open-source social media platform, built with modern web technologies.

name: Restaurant API
description: A robust API for managing restaurant operations, integrating multiple databases and real-time communication features.

name: Restaurant Front-End
description: The front-end interface for the Restaurant platform, providing an intuitive UI for managing restaurant operations.

name: OwProduct
description: Subscription platform for inventory management, using hexagonal architecture on the back-end. It features middleware for importing XLSX and CSV files, integration with Mercado Pago for payments, and Recharts for data visualization.

name: LizeLoca
description: Currency conversion platform with Admin and Customer environments. The Admin manages languages and digital wallet APIs, while the Customer offers a secure and intuitive conversion interface.

name: BloxTrade
description: A currency conversion platform with dual environments: Admin for managing integrations and Customer for secure conversions, built with modern technologies for scalability.

name: Seringueiros
description: A property and rubber tree plantation management system, tracking rubber tappers, work schedules, and plantation activities with a comprehensive property management interface.

name: Personalisec
description: A customizable platform for personal and business use, integrating modern frameworks and secure authentication.

name: BetGo.AI
description: An AI-powered betting platform with real-time data visualization and secure user authentication.

name: PayCoin
description: A payment processing platform with support for multiple currencies and secure transactions.

name: RazPay
description: A fast and secure payment gateway for businesses, integrating modern authentication and deployment pipelines.

name: Clean Sharp Architecture (My Own Template)
description: A custom C# template implementing Clean Architecture principles for scalable and maintainable applications.

name: Red-Shark Mobile
description: The mobile version of Red-Shark, providing a secure social media experience on Android devices.

name: RansomSharp
description: An educational ransomware developed in C# to demonstrate cybersecurity mechanisms (for learning purposes only).

name: AES Encryptor
description: A simple AES encryption console app in C# for encrypting and decrypting sensitive data.

name: LegacyRPG
description: A text-based RPG set in a medieval fantasy world, allowing players to create characters and embark on quests.

name: LegacyRPG GoLang Version
description: A GoLang version of LegacyRPG, a text-based RPG with medieval fantasy adventures.

name: Nightmare
description: An open-source malware created for educational purposes, resembling the NoEscape tool (for learning only).

name: PythonWare
description: A simple ransomware in Python for educational purposes, demonstrating encryption techniques (not for malicious use).

name: CSGO Aimbot
description: An external aimbot for CSGO developed for educational purposes to explore game hacking techniques.

name: External CSGO Cheat
description: A simple external cheat for CSGO, created for educational purposes to study game security.

name: AutoClick C#
description: A simple autoclicker developed in C# for automating repetitive clicking tasks.

name: Net Speed Test
description: A Node.js program to measure internet speed by downloading a file and calculating average speeds.
